title: "Best Practices on the DNAnexus Platform"
date: 09-10-2023
categories: ["ukbiobank", "dnanexus", "best-practices", "webinar", "free"]

This is an online and free textbook that covers essential skills and best practices for working on the DNAnexus platform.

It covers the following topics:

- Introduction to Object Oriented Filesystems
- Project and File Management on the DNAnexus Platform
- Utilizing Spark on the DNAnexus Platform
- Extracting Phenotypic Data on the DNAnexus Platform
- Working effectively with Hail on the DNAnexus Platform
